timeline.bodyText: disposeOnClear will remove the subscription as soon as the ViewModel is removed, and we can't assume the ViewModel will stick around after the Fragment is destroyed. Do we need this because the photo picker Intent causes the fragment to go away? If so, can we launch image picker synchronously, and only subscribe to image picker results?
timeline.author: gino-m

replies.bodyText:
Initially, I tried subscribing the RxChain in Fragment using it's lifecycle. But during launch of Intent, the fragment gets destroyed and so does the disposable.

can we launch image picker synchronously, and only subscribe to image picker results?

If we separate this logic, then how would we pass the requesting fieldId to update the response later?
Since one observation can have multiple photo fields, we have to know the requesting fieldId in advance. Thoughts?
